WASHINGTON, D.C. - NOVEMBER 19: Speaker of the House Nancy Pelosi speaks during the unveiling of the official portrait of Former Speaker of the House John Boehner at the U.S. Capitol in Washington, D.C. on November 19, 2019. HILL

House Speaker Nancy Pelosi's shoes are seen as she speaks during the closing reception of the New Jersey Democratic State Committee Conference at Harrah's Resort and Casino in Atlantic City, New Jersey on Friday, September 27, 2019. Speaker Nancy Pelosi, along with Governor Phil Murphy, and Democratic presidential candidate Cory Booker spoke to activists, supporters, and Democratic party members during the last day of the two day conference.
(Michelle Gustafson for The New York Times)
NYTCREDIT: Michelle Gustafson for The New York Times

Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer (D-N.Y.), left, walks beside House Speaker Nancy Pelosi (D-Calif.) to a press conference on gun control, on September 9, 2019, on Capitol Hill in Washington.  (Tom Brenner/ For The New York Times)
NYTCREDIT: Tom Brenner for The New York Times

NYT/SAN FRANCISCO, CA. --8/23/2019--Democratic National Committee meeting in San Francisco at the Hilton Union Square. DNC members will hear from a variety of their Presidential primary contenders including Bernie Sanders, Kamala Harris, Cory Booker, Tom Steyer and others though front runner Joe Biden will not appear in person.    ............
<
<
<<<<<<THIS PHOTO>>>>>: Speaker Pelosi addressing the democrats during her welcome.       CREDIT PHOTO: JIM WILSON/THE NEW YORK TIMES . .. . .  . . .  . . ..   .  . .. .  .  . .   . .. .
.
